get.summary: Return industry ranking across SMIs based on latest overall_risk_score and trend.
get.description:
Response structure:
[
  {
    'smi_id': str,
    'smi_name': str,
    'overall_risk_score': float,
    'risk_level': str,
    'fsi_score': float,
    'trend': 'up' | 'down' | 'flat',
    'previous_overall_risk_score': float | None
  }, ...
] sorted by descending overall_risk_score (high risk first).

get.description:
Retrieve the latest submission for a company. If staff, can specify companyId via query.
Non-staff users are restricted to their own company.
Optional query param: companyId

post.description:
Create a new submission. Only permitted roles for their own company.
companyId in payload must match the user's company (unless staff, which we still disallow for POST by policy).

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_active.title: Active
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
